H: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00001010
CODS: 00000000 00000000 00000010
SEP_LEN: 00000000 00000000 00000010
SEP: 00
COLOR1: 00000000 00000000 00000000
COD1: 01
SEP: 00
COLOR2: 11111111 11111111 00000000
COD2: 1
SEP: 00

Separador(2): 00
r: 0 g: 0 b: 0 -> 01
r: ff g: ff b: 0 -> 1
